description: Mobile Application Development is an event in which computer programmers and other students involved in software development collaborate in order to produce a rich usable application within a day. The aim is to cultivate creativity, idea conception and team work. Participants given a theme, must form teams and present an application at the end of the allotted time.

rules.info: Will be announced on the day of Event
The participants will be given a set of products, and they have to sell the products in the university campus.
